div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
Profiles to be supported by IVD Device manufacturers and Labs conforming to this implementation guide.

tr.td: CodeSystem profile for LOINC fragment for the LIVD project.
Bundle profile for the LIVD project.
Catalog profile for the LIVD project.
ObservationDefinition profile for the LIVD project.
DeviceDefinition profile for the LIVD project.
ConceptMap profile for the LIVD project.

div.p: Extensions defined as part of this implementation guide.

tr.td: Test Capability extension for the LIVD project
Device extension for the LIVD project
Vendor Reference Identifier extension for the LIVD project

div.p: Value Sets and/or code systems defined as part of this implementation guide. The "LOINC Code System fragment for LIVD" CodeSystem resource contains a sample set of LOINC codes. The actual set of LOINC codes that will be used in a LIVD bundle instance would be based on the specific devices and LOINC mappings that are included. This content is duplicated for LIVD to provide the source of all of the needed content fully contained within the LIVD bundle.

td.a: • LOINC Code System fragment for LIVD

tr.td: LOINC Code System fragment for LIVD
Includes the subset of LOINC codes that are relevant for this ConceptMap.
Includes the allowed section types for the LIVD catalog.
Includes the allowed section types for the LIVD catalog.
Allowed types of bundles for the LIVD catalog

div.p: Example(s) showing the use of the LIVD profiles. DRAFT content not to be used for actual LOINC mappings.

tr.td: Example LIVD publication bundle. DRAFT - Unofficial Content For FHIR LIVD Examples Only; content does not represent actual manufacturer mappings. This content is not to be used for actual LOINC mappings.

Abbott ARCHITECT example LIVD publication bundle. DRAFT - Unofficial Content For FHIR LIVD Examples Only; content does not represent actual Abbott manufacturer mappings. This content is not to be used for actual LOINC mappings.

Roche qualitative example LIVD publication bundle. DRAFT - Unofficial Content For FHIR LIVD Examples Only; content does not represent actual Roche manufacturer mappings. This content is not to be used for actual LOINC mappings.

Roche quantitative example LIVD publication bundle. DRAFT - Unofficial Content For FHIR LIVD Examples Only; content does not represent actual Roche manufacturer mappings. This content is not to be used for actual LOINC mappings.
